sep.gaia.renderer.layer

Class WikipediaAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.renderer.layer.ResourceAdapter<R>
      • sep.gaia.renderer.layer.WikipediaAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceObserver<WikipediaData>

    public class WikipediaAdapter
extends ResourceAdapter<R>
    This class receives updates about new Wikipedia-POIs available and converts their coordinates into GL-Coordinates. The converted resources can be used for drawing by the WikipediaLayer afterwards.
    Author:
    Matthias Fisch, Michael Mitterer

        public void onUpdate(java.util.Collection<WikipediaData> resources)
        Converts the coordinates of all Wikipedia-POIs to GL-coordinates by converting them and storing the result in a copies position.

      • getTexture

        public com.jogamp.opengl.util.texture.Texture getTexture(java.lang.String key)
        Checks first if a texture with the given key is contained in primary texture-cache. If it is not the secondary texture-cache is checked. For a description of the caches see Caching.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the texture.
        Returns:
        The texture identified by key or null if it is not found in both caches.
